# Drone News 48h Brief — November 15, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 48 incidents._

## Summary
Over the past 48 hours, drone-related incidents have spanned various categories, notably in smuggling and arrests, with prominent developments reported in Punjab and Ohio. The Border Security Force (BSF) in Punjab has thwarted multiple cross-border smuggling attempts, recovering contraband including drones and firearms. In Ohio, lawmakers are pushing for regulations regarding drone usage by law enforcement, indicating an increasing scrutiny on drones' applications in security roles. Notably, incidents of drones interfering with civil aviation have also been reported, including sighting occurrences at Brussels airport leading to flight disruptions. This period highlights broader concerns regarding illegal drone activities, prompting governmental responses to tighten security measures.

**By category:** airport: 3 • arrest: 2 • interference: 1 • other: 25 • security: 5 • smuggling: 9 • terrorism: 3
**Top queries:** drone incident (11), drone terrorism (9), drone illegal (5), drone prison (5), drone smuggling (5)
